This product holds great value for those who appreciate its quality and functionality. I am offering it to you for $150, which I believe reflects its true worth and provides an excellent opportunity for you to experience its benefits. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
